Attack interval increases, attack range increased, attacks deal 100% ATK as Physical damage twice.
If an enemy has been defeated while skill is active, Trait effect is not reset when skill expires. This can be manually deactivated. (Skill can be halted at any time while active)

Attack range increased, Trait effect increases by 2x (Trait multiplier -10% for each enemy defeated), attacks hit 5 targets for 110% ATK as Physical damage. When an enemy within range is attacked by a Kazimierz Operator, deal an extra 8% of Młynar's ATK as True damage.

elite_levels.description: ATK increased to 105% when attacking. If there are 3 or more enemies nearby, ATK increased to 110%, and take 10% less damage
ATK increased to 110% when attacking. If there are 3 or more enemies nearby, ATK increased to 115%, and take 15% less damage

potential_upgrades.description: ATK increased to 108% (+3%) when attacking. If there are 3 or more enemies nearby, ATK increased to 113% (+3%), and take 10% less damage
ATK increased to 113% (+3%) when attacking. If there are 3 or more enemies nearby, ATK increased to 118% (+3%), and take 15% less damage

elite_levels.description: More likely to be attacked while deployed. When any Kazimierz Operator is attacked, reflect 15% of Młynar's ATK as True Damage

potential_upgrades.description: More likely to be attacked while deployed. When any Kazimierz Operator is attacked, reflect 18% (+3%) of Młynar's ATK as True Damage
